briefdescription.para: Return the top matrix on the matrix stack.

simplesect.para: A copy of the top matrix

briefdescription.para: Pop the top matrix on the matrix stack.

Return the top matrix with a new matrix.

briefdescription.para: Multiply the top matrix with a new matrix.

parameterdescription.para: The new matrix to replace the top

memberdef.argsstring: (float degrees, float axisX, float axisY, float axisZ)
memberdef.name: Rotate
